subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are ready to lend money
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire TODAY):
$418,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest entire payment!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this one-minute form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://xysidge.com/
